pins.name: Seabreeze Manor
pins.prose:
A stately manor house recently purchased by the Avento family and occupied by Thrakor.
Publically, Thrakor has been rewarded for engineering services to the Kingdom. Secretly, the manor is now a smuggling drop and safehouse.

pins.name: The Sorcerers Three
pins.prose:
Magnar and Risely are hunting down three sorcerers who seem to be trying to harness the power of gods.
One sorcerer has already been dealt with.
Erathis has tracked the remaining two to the Silverleaf Forest, where they appear to be experimenting on local aberrant creatures.

pins.name: Twynburh
pins.prose:
Someone in the upper echelons of the new Greenhart administration wants Erathis, and by extension the party, dead.
Erathis has made contact with his brother, and the party has started working with Investigator Calistane.
Lydia may have some useful assassin's guild contacts.

pins.name: Ballthasar Ascended
pins.prose:
The party fought Ballthasar in the Ruins of Djurnoth, though it turned out only to be a projection or shade.
He is still out there somewhere...
